ch.nolix.system.application

Class StandardClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.system.application.Client<StandardClient>
      • ch.nolix.system.application.StandardClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Abortable, OptionalSignable

    public final class StandardClient
extends Client<StandardClient>
    A standard client is a client that provides standard functionalities.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StandardClient(Application<StandardClient> targetApplication)
      Creates new standard client that will connect to the given target application.
      StandardClient(DuplexController duplexController)
      Creates new standard client with the given duplex controller.
      StandardClient(java.lang.String ip, int port, java.lang.String targetApplication)
      Creates new standard client that will connect to the given target application on the given port on the computer with the given ip.

      Lets this standard client run and clear its appended commands on its origin machine.

      Lets this standard client run the given command on its origin machine.
